SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH !-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Subscription ID" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Certificate location" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Certificate Password" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PSWD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "VM Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_VM_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Cloud Service Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CLOUD_SERVICE#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_DEPLOYMENT#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Command" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_COMMAND#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Load package parameters :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.LOAD_PCK_PARAMETERS
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! ! Action name :SET &UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME# = "VM_STATE"
:DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# ,string
!Check for action :SWITCH &UC4RB_AZR_COMMAND# : CASE "SHUTDOWN_DEALLOCATE_VM" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "StoppedDeallocated"
: CASE "SHUTDOWN_VM" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "Stopped"
: CASE "START_VM" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "START"
: CASE "RESTART_VM" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "RESTART" :ENDSWITCH
! Define java options and values :DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#, string, 20
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "$AZR_OPTION_VALUE."="&UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[3] = "-subscriptionid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "$AZR_OPTION_VALUE."="&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[5] = "-keystore" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "$AZR_OPTION_VALUE."="&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[7] = "-vmname" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "$AZR_OPTION_VALUE."="&UC4RB_AZR_VM_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[9] = "-servicename" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "$AZR_OPTION_VALUE."="&UC4RB_AZR_CLOUD_SERVICE#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[10] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[11] = "-deploymentname" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "$AZR_OPTION_VALUE."="&UC4RB_AZR_DEPLOYMENT#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[12] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[13] = "-vmstate" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "$AZR_OPTION_VALUE."="&UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[14] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
! password is decrypted and send to jar as argument : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PSWD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" java -jar &UC4RB_AZR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -password %UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" java -jar &UC4RB_AZR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -password $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD : ENDIF :ENDIF
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** START_STOP_RESTART ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** START_STOP_RESTART ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
! Publishing request token in case of success :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# = 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1)
: SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# <> "" : IF &VALUE# <> "" : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_AZR_REQUEST_ID" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_REQUEST_ID# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_AZR_REQUEST_ID#,,"TOP" : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
